item.title: Unreachable Statement
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:265203”] /*Start of Barrow sets*/ public boolean dharokSetEquipped() { if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722); { return true; } else { return false; } } /*End of Barrow sets*/

You needed the ‘else’.[/quote]
Almost

You have an if statement with no body, there’s a semi-colon at the end.

public boolean dharokSetEquipped() {
    if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722)
    {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;		
    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Unreachable Statement
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

/*Start of Barrow sets*/ public boolean dharokSetEquipped() { if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722); { return true; } else { return false; } } /*End of Barrow sets*/

You needed the ‘else’.

Read full topic

item.title: Unreachable Statement
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Hey!

I just came across a problem that I can’t see the error in. It’s an ‘Unreachable Statement’ erorr. This error is in the method where I check where the player has full Dharok’s equipped or not.

Here is the error:

.\server\players\Client.java:272: unreachable statement return false; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Here is the code:

/*Start of Barrow sets*/ public boolean dharokSetEquipped() { if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722); { return true; } return false; } /*End of Barrow sets*/

I appreciate ANY kind of help.

Thanks in advance!
-Skullator

Read full topic
